biography: Josh Hammond was born on September 7, 1979 in Boise, Idaho, USA as Joshua Paul Hammond. He is an actor and producer, known for Jeepers Creepers II (2003), The Brotherhood (2001) and Black Cadillac (2003). He has been married to Kristina Page since April 11, 2009. They have two children. He was previously married to Valerie Hammond.
name: Josh Hammond
